title: Non-KYC Crypto Exchange FixedFloat Hacked for $26M in Bitcoin, Ethereum
description: While slow to notify users that their systems were compromised, the non-custodial, automated exchange said users’ funds are safe.

title: Taproot Wizards Reveal Bitcoin’s Onchain Payment Struggles During $15M Sale
description: Sending bitcoin onchain remains a poor payment experience despite the hype surrounding the leading crypto asset, according to Taproot Wizards founder Udi Wertheimer. In a recent post-mortem of a high-volume sale using bitcoin, Wertheimer detailed several pain points with onchain payments including long confirmation times, lack of payment amount enforcement, high fees, and insufficient Lightning […]

title: Virginia plans $17k budget for Blockchain and Crypto Commission
description: Virginia proposes $17,192 annual funding for its Blockchain and Cryptocurrency Commission for 2025 and 2026 to study and recommend blockchain technology.

title: Bitcoin drives record $2.4b weekly digital asset investment inflows
description: Bitcoin was a pacesetter as the U.S. dominated inflows to crypto-based products between Feb. 12 and Feb. 16, with 2024 YTD numbers hitting $5.2 billion.

title: Shiba Inu Eyes $0.011 Rally as Ecosystem Projects Near Completion by 2024 End
description: Lucie, Shiba Inu’s content specialist, shared insights into the roadmap, emphasizing a comprehensive approach for the Shiba Inu ecosystem growth. The SHIB burn rate has surged by a staggering 3,400%, resulting in the removal of over 52 million tokens from circulation, reshaping the asset’s scarcity and potential valuation. Shiba Inu enthusiasts are buzzing with anticipation [...]
